      void displayImage(android.widget.ImageView imageView, java.lang.String fileId, int defaultImage)
      display image to ImageView, if image is in memory cache show it from there, else if image is in file cache show it form file cache, else get image from web and save it to file cache

      • displayImage

        public void displayImage(android.widget.ImageView imageView,
                java.lang.String fileId,
                int defaultImage,
                ImageLoaderSpice.OnImageDisplayFinishListener onFinishListener)
        display image to ImageView, if image is in memory cache show it from there, else if image is in file cache show it form file cache, else get image from web and save it to file cache
        Parameters:
        imageView -
        fileId - url of image
        defaultImage - image to show if failed to download image
        onFinishListener - triggered when image is shown in ImageView
